description: Create Registration function => When user input username ( not exist in game room) => Redirect to playing game=> Assign ID (Position) for this player </br>  If one person go out the playing game page => Update the position for all remain users</br>  Check validation for user input in registration</br>  Update the amount of waiting players</br>  If have enough 5 players=> Game Status= Game Start</br>
